entry.title: Wolf Among Flowers
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,205Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 217

Summary: “Gerard wanted me to think you were cruel—crueler than him, actually.” Derek stood to his full height, taking a step closer to Stiles as he placed his thumb and forefinger against Stiles’ chin. He was gentle in his prompting—the gentlest he had been since the last time he had held Cora as a baby. “I would never make you hunt. I would never make you kill.” Stiles blinked, his mouth partially parting. But he didn’t know what to say. “I never wish that feeling on anyone,” Derek finally stated, dropping his hand from Stiles. ~*~ Or Beauty and the Beast vibes, also known as the one where scarred, battle weary Prince Derek Hale is married by proxy to the adorable, bookworm scholar Stiles Stilinski.

entry.title: Rules of Falling
entry.summary:
Author: aliyahtamara98x

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,139Chapters: 35/35Kudos: 5

Summary: Starting over at Silverlake University, Stiles Stilinski only wants something simple — new memories, quiet nights, and a life that finally feels like his.Then he meets Derek Hale.Closed-off. Unexpectedly gentle. Impossible to ignore.What begins as a slow, fragile connection soon deepens into something that feels like home… until Stiles learns not everything about love is honest, and not every heart comes without secrets.A story about falling when you least expect it, loving when it’s terrifying, and discovering whether forgiveness can grow where trust once shattered.Inspired by After by Anna Todd.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,527Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 156

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: If You Want to Kill Somebody, Conquer His Heart ... Then Leave Them Between Death and Madness
entry.summary:
Author: StilesIsMySpiritAnimal_48

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,402Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 44

Summary: Derek Hale used to think pain came in sharp bursts — claws, fire, gunshots, loss compressed into a single unbearable moment. He never knew pain could be an echo. Repeating. Endless. Soft enough that no one else could hear it, loud enough to drown him. And the worst part was that it hadn’t always been like this. It used to be good. Better than good. It used to be Stiles.

entry.title: This Is What It Takes To Breathe (we're getting up again)
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,067Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 14

Summary: It was supposed to be a routine extraction. A silent base buried beneath Lublin. Thirty agents gone in less than five minutes. And a threat classified as nothing more than a bioweapon — something the SPECTRA team was sent to contain before it could spread. But there’s something else waiting in the dark. Something that moves like a rumor and kills like a certainty. Seraphim. A name whispered across black files and unmarked graves. A figure too thin to be real, too precise to be human. Every step a calculation. Every breath borrowed. Eyes like dying stars, watching without ever revealing what they see. Derek Hale has faced the impossible before — monsters, gods, and everything between. But when Seraphim turns toward him, something shifts. Because beneath the blood and command lines, there is a fracture. A question. A boy who shouldn’t exist, but does. And Derek realizes that the real danger isn’t what Seraphim is. It’s what he becomes once he’s finally pulled out of the dark.
